subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[lose]]; to [[lose]] [[track]] of
# to [[omit]]; to [[leave out]]
# to [[abandon]]; to [[forgo]]; to [[abolish]]; to [[annul]]
# to [[forget]]; to [[fail]] to [[remember]]
# to [[lack]]; to be [[short]] of
# to [[leave]] behind; to [[leave]] over; to [[hand down]]
# to [[bequeath]]; to [[leave]] behind at one's [[death]]; to [[leave]] in [[will]]
# [[left]] by the [[deceased]]
# to [[emit]]; to [[discharge]] (involuntarily)
# something [[lost]]; lost [[article]]s; lost [[property]]

subSections.title: Readings
Etymology 1
Affix
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|affix|い|hhira=ゐ}}

# be [[left]], [[remain]]
# [[leave behind]] after one's [[death]], [[bequeath]]
# [[leave behind]], [[forget]]
# [[give]], [[present]]
# [[let]] [[leak]]

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|遺棄|いき}}: [[abandonment]]; [[desertion]]
* {{ja-r|遺孤|いこ}}: [[orphan]]
* {{ja-r|遺産|いさん}}: [[inheritance]]
* {{ja-r|遺%失|い%しつ}}: [[loss]]
* {{ja-r|遺伝子|いでんし}}: [[gene]]
* {{ja-r|遺言|ゆいごん}}; {{ja-r|遺言|いごん}}: [[will#Noun|will]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology 2
Usage notes
subSections.text: Only used in {{ja-r|遺言|ゆいごん|will; testament}}.
